author: Rappler.com
title: LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 6 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots
text:
LIVE BLOG: 2017 PBA semifinals Game 6 - Ginebra vs Star Hotshots Bookmark this page for live updates on Sunday, February 19 starting at 6:30 pm! Published 3:04 PM, February 19, 2017 Updated 12:10 AM, February 20, 2017 
MANILA, Philippines â€“ Will this Manila Clasico series come to a close in 6 games? 
The Star Hotshots will play to get rid of rivals Barangay Ginebra in Game 6   on Sunday, February 19 at the Smart Araneta Coliseum. 
The Gin Kings, on the other hand, will fight to live another day. 
Get blow-by-blow updates of this crucial Game 6 through Rappler's live blog starting at 6:30 pm! Semis G6 - Ginebra v Star - Curated tweets by RapplerSports
